directives.name: code
directives.description: Renders the content within the block as a pre-formatted code block, preserving spacing and special characters. The content is treated as plain text.

directives.name: if
directives.description: Conditionally renders a block of content based on an expression. Can be used with @elseif and @else.

parents.name: elseif
parents.description: A subsequent conditional block if the preceding @if or @elseif is false.

parents.name: else
parents.description: A block that renders if all preceding @if and @elseif conditions are false.

directives.name: for
directives.description: A loop directive to iterate over arrays or objects.

directives.name: import
directives.description: Imports and renders another EJB template file. This is a self-closing directive.

directives.name: component
directives.description: Renders a template as a component, allowing for content projection using slots.

parents.name: slot
parents.description: Defines a named slot within a component.

directives.name: isset
directives.description: Checks if a variable is defined and not null, then renders it. This is a self-closing directive.
